mdRecord.dcterms:isPartOf: Francis H. Pierpont Civil War Telegrams
mdRecord.dcterms:title: Hagans, Henry C. to Wheat, James S.
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Hagans, Henry C.
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Adjt Genl Wheat Wheeling Va. Sept 1 1861. By Telegraph from Cumberland 1861. We have been notified to make out our pay Rolls Muster Rolls & monthly Reports to be ready for pay master all according to army Regulations this we cannot do without the blanks & have not succeeded in getting them from any source as yet if you will forward us the necessary blanks we can comply with the regulations. HC Hagans Com Post 57H228coll
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Hagans, Henry C.
Cumberland, Maryland
Wheeling, (West) Virginia
Wheat, James S.
